channel.title: Pie on Prosper Us Detroit
channel.description: Recent content in Pie on Prosper Us Detroit

item.title: People of ProsperUS: Jennifer Lyle, Lush Yummies Pie Co.
item.description: This is the sixth post in “People of ProsperUS,” showcasing the incredible stories of entrepreneurs connected to ProsperUS. This post features Jennifer Lyle, the owner of Lush Yummies Pie Company. “[My business is] Lush Yummies Pie Co. I sell pie; my signature pie is my Lemon “Butta” pie.” ON STARTING A BUSINESS “I’ve always had an entrepreneurial spirit, I think. My grandmother started the first minority-owned business school in Detroit in 1973; it still stands today.
